enhanced_description: LHH is a global HR services provider focused on guiding clients, candidates, and colleagues to adapt and flourish in an ever-evolving workplace landscape. With 8,000 colleagues serving 15,000 clients across 66 countries, LHH impacts millions of lives annually through its core services: recruitment, outplacement and mobility, and leadership development. The company aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and help organizations hire top talent faster and more efficiently. LHH prepares organizations and individuals for the future of work by focusing on human potential, pioneering career transitions, and innovating in talent development. They have supported over 500,000 people globally in reaching their career goals.
